org.bson.codecs.pojo.annotations

Annotation Type BsonProperty


  • @Documented
 @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD,PARAMETER})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface BsonProperty
    An annotation that configures a property.

    Note: Requires the Conventions.ANNOTATION_CONVENTION

    Since:
    3.5
    See Also:
    Conventions.ANNOTATION_CONVENTION

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean useDiscriminator 
      String value
      The value to use for the mapped property when storing the property in the database.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        The value to use for the mapped property when storing the property in the database.
        Returns:
        the name to use for the property
        See Also:
        PropertyModel.getWriteName()
        Default:
        ""

      • useDiscriminator

        public abstract boolean useDiscriminator
        Returns:
        whether to include a discriminator when serializing nested Pojos.
        Default:
        false
